summary: Changes Hulda\'s appearance to appear older, as what would make sense given her dialogue.
descriptionHtml:
I never liked how Hulda looked 30 when she acts like she\'s 55 so I changed her to look older. I doubt anyone will download my mod because all women in the game have to look like 20 something supermodels and conform to their perfect vision of a woman. Sexists. 

Anyway, I wanted to fix that immersion breaking issue and release it so the half dozen people who share my views can enjoy the mod too.

Peace.

EDIT: I\'m shocked that this has 42 downloads and 6 endorsements, it\'s way more than I expected. Thank you everyone who had downloaded and supported this mod. 

#Changelog

-1.1.0

Added a Loose Files version to the download. 
Made small tweaks to her face, again. 

Note, I had it down as 1.2.0 in the readme and file name of the new version. This was a silly little failure of mine because I was rushed. 

#Installation:

BSA version: Drop Older Hulda.bsa and Older Hulda.esp in your data folder, and select it in your prefered mod manager. 

Loose Files version: Drop Older Hulda.esp, the model and texture folders into your data. Select the ESP in your prefered mod manager. 

#Compatibility 
Should work with pretty much any and all mods. 

#Credits
-foretrenty: For his awesome NPC Editor.
author: THEWULFMAN
